body_html: I also think that if we're going to use a name that's already taken then it's usually a better idea to conform to whatever NumPy is doing, even if it doesn't make too much sense. It's often too confusing otherwise

body: I also think that if we're going to use a name that's already taken then it's usually a better idea to conform to whatever NumPy is doing, even if it doesn't make too much sense. It's often too confusing otherwise
